ygData.subject: Re: Hero bracer
ygData.msgSnippet: It s medium sized armor - high elves cannot wear. Human, Barbarian, Half-Elf only, sorry wood elves, get some Lame Bent bl00bicite bracers or something. =P
ygData.messageBody:
It's medium sized armor - high elves cannot wear. Human, Barbarian, Half-Elf
only, sorry wood elves, get some Lame Bent bl00bicite bracers or something.
=P

Sartori D'Elsiraad
50th Bard, Servant of Quellious the Tranquil
Veeshan
